description: This easy vegan egg salad recipe is made with just 5 ingredients in less than 15 minutes. It has the texture and flavor of real egg salad without the hard boiled eggs. It's perfect for a simple lunch or snack.
keywords: eggless tofu salad, vegan egg salad, vegan tofu salad
name: Vegan Egg Salad
recipeIngredient: 14 ounces medium-firm tofu (Press with paper towel to remove excess water.)
2 to 3 tablespoons finely chopped dill pickle

recipeInstructions.text: Press the tofu with paper towels to remove the excess water and chop into small pieces.

In a large mixing bowl, stir the tofu, 1/4 cup vegan mayo, 1 tablespoon Dijon mustard, 2 to 3 tablespoons chopped pickle, 2 tablespoons chopped chives, 1/2 teaspoon celery salt, 1/8 teaspoon black salt (See Note), and salt and black pepper to taste until fully combined.
